goals.active: Receive information from Gixx via the mail.
goals.complete: Steward Gixx told me to meet with the other Durmand Priory operatives near the Durmand Memorial in Lion's Arch.

goals.active: Aid the Durmand Priory and defend Lion's Arch.
goals.complete: Zhaitan's forces attacked from the beach, but we held them off. General Soulkeeper is returning to Vigil Keep to rally an army. In the meantime, Trahearne and I are going to call upon our allies across the continent. Tyria is in great danger.
